pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves made of: barrier laminate, butyl rubber ≥14 mils, natural rubber ≥14 mils, neoprene rubber ≥14 mils, nitrile rubber ≥14 mils, polyethylene, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) ≥14 mils, or Viton® ≥14 mils; Shoes plus socks

Active_Ingredients.name: Mefenoxam
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Phenylamide class; interferes with fungal RNA synthesis

Active_Ingredients.name: Fludioxonil
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Phenylpyrrole class; interferes with osmotic signal transduction

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if absorbed through skin. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with skin, eyes, or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.

Application_Info.units: fl oz per 100 lb of seed
